title: NAS-HA Services
subtitle: Manage your NAS-HA storage services
no_services_description: You don't have any NAS-HA services yet. Create one to get started.
delete_service_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the service {{serviceName}}?
delete_service_warning: This action is irreversible and will permanently delete the service and all its data.
create_service_info: The service will be created with the specified parameters. Billing will start immediately.
